short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Warns if a product contains seed oils.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Seed Oil Alert scans product ingredients on popular online grocery stores showing a banner when it detects seed oils such as canola, soybean, sunflower, and more. Transform your online grocery shopping experience with Seed Oil Alert, the essential Chrome plugin designed for health-conscious consumers. 

Features:

- Real-Time Alerts: A banner is shown on the page when seed oils are detected in the products you view, helping you make healthier choices effortlessly.
- Comprehensive Coverage: Supports a wide range of online grocery stores, ensuring you're informed no matter where you shop. Suggest your store if it is not supported yet. 
- Detailed Information: Learn about the specific seed oils present in each product.
- User-Friendly Interface: A sleek design that integrates seamlessly into your browsing experience. The banner is shown on top of the product page of your shop. 

Why Use Seed Oil Alert?

Seed oils are often hidden in everyday grocery items and can be detrimental to your health. With Seed Oil Alert, you can take control of your diet and avoid unwanted ingredients with minimal effort. Whether you're looking to improve your overall wellness or adhere to a specific health regimen, Seed Oil Alert is your go-to companion for smarter, healthier shopping.

How It Works:

    Install the Plugin: Add Seed Oil Alert to your Chrome browser with a simple click.
    Browse Products: Shop on your favorite online grocery stores as usual.
    Get Alerted: See a banner about the seed oils in the products you view.

Make informed decisions and protect your health with every online grocery purchase.

Download Seed Oil Alert Today and Start Shopping Smarter!
